flawed_nl_solution:
In one week he will have saved 20+10=<<20+10=30>>30 dollars
In two weeks he will have saved 30+10=<<30+10=70>>70 dollars
In three weeks he will have saved 70+10=<<70+10=80>>80 dollars
At the end of week four, he will have saved 80+10=<<80+10=90>>90 dollars
#### 90

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 70. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
